title: Police Accountability Misconduct Cases and Allegations
description:
A. SUMMARY This dataset contains public information on police misconduct cases split up by unique allegations. This includes case numbers, dates of receipt, incident locations, police districts involved, allegations made, investigation findings, issuance dates of findings, and case closure dates. Its purpose is to enhance transparency and accountability by providing accessible details about alleged misconduct to the public. By offering insights into the scope and outcomes of investigations, it enables citizens to stay informed about incidents in their communities, fostering trust and facilitating discussions on police accountability and reform efforts. Access to this dataset empowers individuals to monitor the progress of cases and engage in constructive dialogue to promote positive change in law enforcement practices. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED The data set is created when a complaint is made to DPA. DPA opens the case and date is developed through out the life of the case. C. UPDATE PROCESS The data is downloaded once a week from DPAâ€™s Case Management System. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET The dataset includes information on complaints received and closed in the current calendar year. Some cases will display received dates in previous years due to them being closed out in the current year. E. RELATED DATASETS
  • None

columns.name: unique_id
columns.description: Unique ID for the dataset, a combination of case_number, officer_involvement_id, allegation_id, and open_or_closed_case

columns.name: case_type
columns.description: Type of misconduct case

columns.name: case_number
columns.description: Unique ID for the case

columns.name: complainant_age_group
columns.description: Age group of the complainant

columns.name: ethnicity
columns.description: Used to capture complainant ethnicity

columns.name: gender
columns.description: Used to capture complainant gender

columns.name: officer_293_and_public_narrative
columns.description: Public-facing summary of the investigation that is shared externally.

columns.name: complaint_received_date
columns.description: The date that the DPA received a complaint.

columns.name: findings_issued_date
columns.description: Date when findings were identified. Used as closed date on dataset

columns.name: case_origin
columns.description: Origin of the case (phone, online form)

columns.name: referral_to_agency_account_name
columns.description: Agency case was referred to

columns.name: referral_from_agency_account_name
columns.description: Agency case was referred from

columns.name: district
columns.description: Police district

columns.name: officer_involvement_id
columns.description: Unique id for the involved officer

columns.name: allegation_id
columns.description: Unique id for the allegation

columns.name: allegation_type
columns.description: Used to capture the type of allegation for officer involved

columns.name: allegation_summary
columns.description: A standardized picklist of summary of allegations dependent upon allegation type

columns.name: allegation_summary_old
columns.description: A shorter summary of allegations with accompanying information and links. Will populate only on older cases

columns.name: dpa_finding
columns.description: Used to capture Legal Findings associated with an Allegation.

columns.name: open_or_closed_case
columns.description: Used to indicate if a case is open or closed

columns.name: status
columns.description: Stage of the case investigation

columns.name: sub_status
columns.description: Used to capture sub-status of cases

columns.name: case_length_of_investigation_days
columns.description: Length of Investigation in days

columns.name: days_intake_submitted
columns.description: The number of days it took from case received to intake

columns.name: incident_location
columns.description: Location of incident

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: Neighborhood of incident

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: Supervisor District

columns.name: point
columns.description: Geospatial point (Lat / Lon)

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when data was last updated in source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when data was loaded into the Open Data Portal
